name: Fox Wants Pancakes
description:
Short Metroidvania inspired by the "Robot wants kitty"  games by Hamumu Software.

Controls (once unlocked):

  • Move     --->  A, D    or   arrow keys
  • Jump      --->  Space
  • Shoot     ---> X or K
  • Dash       ---> C or L
  • Crouch  ---> S or down arrow
  • Bomb      ---> Z or J
  • Shift +Esc to restart the game

Main Art,  Sunnyland  by Ansimuz    link

Bat animation by Bagzie    link

Troll animation by Umz  link
